entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Nullable decimal comparison bug in dotnet 8.0.5 (SDK 8.0.300) #73510
  • New APIs to support "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #73330
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34917.78 #73568

Updated

  • Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #72124
  • All analyzers from assembly Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeStyle.Fixes failed to load: Unable to load one or more of the requested types. Method not found: 'Boolean Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol.get_IsParamsArray()'. #73508

PullRequests

Created

  • [17.10] Disable nullable comparison optimization for decimals #73572
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Install .NET 9 Runtime on Single Machine CI #73571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Disable nullable comparison optimization for decimals #73536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report EnC warning when entry point is changed #73565
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge branch 'features/RefStructInterfaces' into 'main' #73567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Batch FAR window update messages to lower refresh overhead. #73534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
